content: व्याघातः {@--1@} Striking against. {@--2@} A blow, stroke. {@--3@} An impediment, obstacle. {@--4@} Contradiction. {@--5@} Disobedience; प्रथमं तावन्ममाज्ञाव्याघातः <ls>Mu. 3.</ls> {@--6@} A figure of speech in which opposite effects are shown to be produced from the same cause or by the same agency; it is thus defined by Mammaṭa:-- तद्यथा साधितं केनाप्यपरेण तदन्यथा . तथैव यद्विधीयेत स व्याघात इति स्मृतः <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} see <ls>Vb. 1. 2</ls>, or the quotation under विरूपाक्ष.
